dataset.label_column: Column in dataset which has the labels.
dataset.data_column: Column in dataset which has the data which needs to be labeled.

model.provider: Provider of model such as openai, huggingface. Currently only supporting OpenAI.
model.name: Name of the model. Currently only supporting gpt-3.5-turbo .

prompt.task_guidelines: Explain the task which needs to be performed.
prompt.output_guidelines: Output to be expected such as label.
prompt.example_template: Template of example prompt. Eg: Input: , Output:
